name: Crused chase
description:
USE FULL SCREEN

This is my first 3D game made in less than 10h for the Kenney Jam 2020, the them is cursed. Soo this is a cursed chase, you have to run out of the police, that's all.

I'm sorry for the physics.

Assets from Kenney

Background music by Tallbeard Studios

Sounds from free sound

Confetti effect from code monkey
